summary: 2022 Fall Semester Admission for Graduate Students■ Admission process     Category  1st Period  Important Information    Application  2022.04.18(Mon) ~04.29(Fri)  - Complete the online application (enter.mju.ac.kr) and submit the documents either via post or in-person.
